contentrichtext.text: {{see also|Pioneer Island (Nunavut)}} {{Infobox islands | name = Pioneer Island | local name = | native name = | image name = PioneerIsland Terra MODIS.jpg | image caption = | image size = | locator map = Pioneer Island.svg|thumb | map caption = Pioneer Island, Russia. | locator map size = | nickname = | location = | coordinates = | archipelago = [[Severnaya Zemlya]] | total islands = | major islands = | area_km2 = | length_km = | width_km = | highest mount = | elevation_m = | population = 0 | population as of = | density_km2 = | ethnic groups = | country = [[Russia]] | additional info = }} '''Pioneer Island''' is part of the [[Severnaya Zemlya]] group in the [[Russia]]n [[Arctic]]. It measures {{convert|1527|km²|sqmi|0|abbr=on}} in area. The island was discovered by [[Georgy Ushakov]] and [[Nikolay Urvantsev]] during their 1930-32 expedition.<ref name=Barr1975>{{ cite journal|author=Barr, William |year=1975|title=Severnaya Zemlya: the last major discovery |journal=Geographical Journal|volume=141|number=1|pages=59–71|doi=10.2307/1796946}}</ref> This island contains the Pioneer Glacier.<ref>{{Wayback|url=http://www.oceandots.com/arctic/severnaya-zemlya|title=Russian Arctic - Severnaya Zemlya<!-- Bot generated title -->|date=20101223043232}}</ref> There has been a request to rename this island '''Svyataya Tatiana''' (St. Tatiana).<ref>[http://eng.www.r24.kadastr.ru/search/?text=severnaya+zemlya&all_regions=&document_type=&select=0 Search - Krasnoyarsk Territory - Rosnedvizhimost<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> Geological and biological data: <ref>[http://cat.inist.fr/?aModele=afficheN&cpsidt=13724455 Cat.Inist<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> & <ref>{{cite web | url=http://www.jstor.org/discover/10.2307/1478878?uid=3739856&uid=2&uid=4&uid=3739256&sid=47698760661647 | title=Interactions between Vegetation Development and Island Formation in the Alpine River Tagliamento | publisher=Applied Vegetation Science | work=Vol. 2, No. 1 | accessdate=March 14, 2012 | author=Kollmann, J. (et al.) | pages=25-36}}</ref> ==See also== * [[List of islands of Russia]] ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== {{Kara Sea Islands}} {{coord|79.917|N|92.033|E|display=title|source:dewiki}} [[Category:Islands of the Kara Sea]] [[Category:Islands of Severnaya Zemlya]]
